HOME_FIRST_TITLE: Start now by creating your own room, and wait for others to join.
HOME_SECOND_TITLE: Or join others and find new friends to play with.
QUICK_JOIN_TITLE: Gamerooms you might be interested in
ALL_FIELDS_REQUIRED: Have you filled out all required fields?
CREATE_LOBBY_LOBBYNAME_ERROR: Please include a short name for your lobby.
CREATE_LOBBY_LOBBYTYPE_ERROR: Please choose the type of lobby.
FIND_LOBBY_LATEST_NEWS: Check out the latest news from the developers
SUBJECT: Subject
LOBBY_READY_CHECK_TEXT: The host has started a ready check...
LOBBY_DECLINED_ERROR: Someone has declined. Going back to lobby...
LOBBY_END_LOBBY_TEXT: Are you sure you want to end the lobby?
LOBBY_JOIN_DISCORD_TEXT: We have created a room for you at our Discord. Click the button below to join!
LOBBY_JOIN_DISCORD_LINK_TEXT: Or paste the link below into your browser
LEAVE_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to leave?
DISCORD_TERMS: By linking your Discord account, you acknowledge and agree that your Discord ID will be publicly visible in the Playfu API. You may choose to hide this information from other users after connecting. If you do not want this information shared, please disconnect your account.
STEAM_TERMS: By linking your Steam account, you acknowledge and agree that your Steam ID will be publicly visible in the Playfu API. You may choose to hide this information from other users after connecting. If you do not want this information shared, please disconnect your account.
REQUEST_DATA_INFO: If you would like to request a copy of the personal data you've given us over the lifetime of your account, you can do so by clicking the 'Request' button.
REQUEST_DATA_INFO_ONE: It may take up to 14 days.
REQUEST_DATA_INFO_TWO: You can't make a request while a request is pending.
REQUEST_DATA_INFO_THREE: When your data is ready, you will recieve an email containing the data.
REQUEST_DATA_INFO_FOUR: Do not change your email while the request is pending. The data will be sent to the email address you had when you first requested the data.
REQUEST_DATA_INFO_FIVE: If you delete your account, the request will be cancelled.
DELETE_ACCOUNT_INFO: When you delete your account, your profile, history, connections, followers and likes will be permanently removed. This can not be undone.
DELETE_ACCOUNT_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
